sections.heading: Elections; voting by proxies; when permitted
sections.text: At all elections any person living outside the different counties owning or controlling assessed real estate may vote by proxy duly authorized in writing on file with the county clerk.SourceLaws 1907, c. 153, ยง 28, p. 484;R.S.1913, ยง 1898;C.S.1922, ยง 1846
